title: Zoho campus drive
text:
ZOHO is conducting off campus drive on 21-04-2018 & 22-04-2018 at Sairam College of Engineering, Bangalore 
Students who are passionate about programming can register in the below link (2016, 2017 & 2018 passed out students)
https://www.zohocorp.com/openings.html 
Campus Date : 21st & 22nd April.
 Position: Software Developer 
Eligibility Criteria: We do not have any criteria, students from any stream/department (UG/PG) even with Backlogs can appear for the test. Passion towards programming is our only criteria. 
Packages Offered:  
 6.5L Offer - Candidates those who clear all levels of tests and interviews. 
 4.6L Offer - Candidates who fell short of the expectations, but meet our requirements.
 Please find below our process in detail. 
 Day - 1 - 09:00 AM 
 *Level 1 - Written tests for 2 hours, test will be based on C Programming. The test would commence at 09:00 AM.
 The shortlisted students will appear for a Second Level Programming test on the machine (system) on the same day (post lunch) by 02:00 PM.  
 Day - 1 - 02:00 PM  
 *Level 2 - Programming test on the Machine(system) 
 The shortlisted students from the Second Level will appear for a Third Level Programming test on the machine(system) on the following day 
 Day - 2  - 09:00 AM 
 *Level 3 - Programming test on the machine (system)/n The shortlisted students from the Third Level will appear for Technical/Personal (HR) interviews on the same day (Post-lunch).

title: Taylor Swift
text:
Binary Fountain Solutions India Pvt Ltd requires
 IT Freshers (Java / Python)
 0 - 0 years experience
 Job Location : Technopark, Trivandrum
 Brief Description 
 Build and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable Java code
 Design, implementation and testing of modules as directed by the team lead
 Preferred skills
 Core Java, J2EE
 RDBMS, MySQL
 Python
 Qualification
 BS/MS degree in Computer Science, MCA, B.Tech
 Experience
 0-2 Years experience
 Walk-in Interview on 18th & 19th April 2018 between 11.00 am to 4.00 pm at :
 Binary Fountain Solutions India Pvt Ltd, L4, Ground Floor (Level -1),
